author: leggat
body:
Implementing per ring/layer ROC counting trend plots in the phase 1 pixel DQM summary code.

Trend plots for FPIX and BPIX were originally added in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18993, this PR is to turn these into the per-layer/ring versions.
title: ROC counting trend plots per layer/ring for phase 1 pixel DQM
